素.definition: raw silk; white; plain, unadorned; vegetarian (food); essence; nature; element; constituent; usually; always; ever

素人.definition: untrained, inexperienced person; layman; amateur; ordinary person; non-celebrity

素來.definition: consistently; always (in the past and now)

素昧平生.definition: (idiom) to have never met sb before; entirely unacquainted

素有.definition: to have; to have always had

素未謀面.definition: (idiom) to have never met; to be complete strangers

素淨.definition: simple and neat; quiet (colors); unobtrusive; (of food) light; not greasy or strongly flavored

素筵.definition: vegetarian feast; food offerings to Buddha

素質教育.definition: all-round education (contrasted with 應試教育|应试教育[ying4 shi4 jiao4 yu4], exam-oriented education)

素面.definition: face (of a woman) without makeup; solid color (unpatterned)

素面朝天.definition: lit. to present oneself confidently to the emperor, without makeup (as did the sister of Yang Guifei 楊貴妃|杨贵妃[Yang2 Gui4 fei1]) (idiom); fig. (of a woman) to show one's natural features, without makeup; to present oneself just as one is, without artifice

素食.definition: vegetarian food; to eat a vegetarian diet
